List scripts

Source: R/make_project.R
ls_scripts.Rd

List scripts

ls_scripts(folder = ".", extn = "r|R|Rmd|rmd", recursive = TRUE)

Arguments

folder

string describing folder to search recursively in
extn

character (can be regex) giving extension to limit search to
recursive

by default TRUE

Examples
